- [ ] Code refactoring
- [ ] Performance improvement
- [ ] Test addition/improvement

## Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] Code follows the project's TypeScript style guidelines
- [ ] Code is properly typed (no `any` types unless necessary)
- [ ] Error handling is comprehensive with actionable error messages
- [ ] Comments added for complex logic
- [ ] No console.log statements (use console.error for errors)

### Documentation
- [ ] README updated (if adding features)
- [ ] API.md updated (if changing API)
- [ ] TROUBLESHOOTING.md updated (if addressing common issues)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md updated
- [ ] Inline code comments added where needed

### Security
- [ ] No credentials or sensitive data in code
- [ ] No security vulnerabilities introduced
- [ ] File paths properly validated
- [ ] Input validation added

### Build & Compatibility
- [ ] Code compiles without errors (`npm run build`)
- [ ] No new dependencies added without justification
- [ ] Compatible with Node.js 16+
- [ ] Works on macOS/Windows/Linux

### Git Hygiene
- [ ] Commit messages are clear and descriptive
- [ ] Branch is up to date with main
- [ ] No merge conflicts
- [ ] No unrelated changes included
